1: Website link (if any) 


www.houseofcure.com


2: Founder details in brief


Our Founder: Hi, Dr. Jhanvi Ganatra ( @drjhanviganatra ), is an Orthodontist and a Dentofacial Orthopedic Surgeon (Gold Medalist) by profession and the Founder of House of Cure, a medical co-working space in Khar, Mumbai - @house_of_cure. Not only is she an excellent Practitioner but also is focused on protecting and supporting her fellow doctors, practitioners, community and society as a whole. Starting House of Cure is her way of contributing to the health sector where not everybody can or should start their own private practise. With 0 financial commitments and 0 contracts required, house of cure will help all the practitioners experience a never seen before, hassle free, form of practice. Her aim is to change the way medical professionals practice. After investing time, money and efforts in their education, a platform like House of Cure will provide an immediate Go-To place for all Health Care professionals where they can focus exclusively on Practice while House of Cure takes care of Everything Else. With no Managerial/ Financial education background, she learns and improvises each coming day in order to serve the community.




3: Company details in brief


House of Cure is Indiaâ€™s First dedicated Medical Co-working Space for every kind of healthcare professional like doctors (General Dentists, Dental Specialists like Prosthodontists, Endodontists, Oral Surgeons, Implantologists, Oral radiologists, Periodontists, Orthodontists, General Medicine Practioners/ specialists like Dermatologists, Psychiatrists, General surgeons, Orthopedics Surgeons, E.N.T. Specialists etc.), nurses, therapists like ( Physiotherapists, Occupational Therapists, Speech Therapists, Psychotherapists, Mental health Specialists etc), nutritionists, physical health professionals, health specialists like physiotherapists, allied medical fields (like naturopathic/ ayurvedic/ homeopathic etc), Consultants (like Lactation Consultants, Health Consultants, Life Coaches, Diet Consultants etc) and so on. 


By Medical Co-Working Space, we mean a space that can accommodate practitioners of any medical sector to see their patients within the same physical address. All this with utmost flexibility and convenience in booking a slot for the same. Not only is it a One-Stop Shop for patients to get treated for anything and everything but its also a place where all medical professionals can engage in positive work discussions and collaborations while forming referral networks with each other to benefit their patients.


With a vision to reduce the financial, administrative and operational burden, we have introduced hourly slots with minimum rentals. There are various bulk booking membership options as well, with a wide range of complimentary benefits and various amenities like trained staff, storage facility options, billing and accounting support, stocked pantry etc included to help practioners manage their practice better.


The space includes:

ðŸ”¹Consultation cabins

ðŸ”¹Examination Cabins

ðŸ”¹Dental Cabins

ðŸ”¹Conference/Training Room

ðŸ”¹Multipurpose Cabin


One cabin is temporarily converted into a donning-doffing room, for doctors to wear PPEs and dispose off soiled PPEs.


House of Cure is a perfect fit for:

ðŸ”¸New practitioners to set up their practice

ðŸ”¸Established practitioners all over the world who wish to expand their practice in Mumbai with no full time rental commitment or management burden

ðŸ”¸ Retiring practitioners who wish to follow their passion without the hassle of backend work


For more details, visit www.houseofcure.com, DM on @house_of_cure OR Call/ WhatsApp on 9090943030

idea:
Piscis Networks is a pioneer in simplifying last-mile connectivity for organizations and individuals across the world. Our mission is to make internet connectivity reach every corner of the world.

The future is wireless and so are we!

We focus primarily on cellular connectivity towards the internet. We bring LTE and 5G-ready products for superior last-mile connectivity. Our research and development team constantly strives to deliver cutting-edge technology that is sensible to most use cases out there. Our strategic partnerships with carefully selected manufacturers, logistics partners and telecoms drive us towards unmatched excellence in the field of cellular connectivity.
name: PISCIS NETWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED
